name: FREE Skincare Tracker Notion Template
description: Organise your skincare with ease with this free skincare tracker. This is ideal for skincare lovers and could potentially be used for make up lovers as well. As a skincare lover, I wanted to keep track of all the products I have and figure out which one's work for my skin and which don't, which is why I've created this free template to help you on your skincare journalThis template includes:→ Create custom routines for your skincare→ Monitor how long you have had the product for→ Sort your skinc
features: This is a digital product. NO physical item will be shipped to you. After Gumroad receives the payment, you will receive a link to your notion template.; All sales are final and non refundable due to this being a digital product.
